benchmark_details.name: PERSONA MEMbenchmark
benchmark_details.overview: PERSONA MEMbenchmark features curated user profiles with over 180 simulated user-LLM interaction histories across 15 real-world tasks that require personalization. It evaluates LLM chatbots’ ability to identify suitable responses based on dynamic user profiles in multi-session interactions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate LLMs’ ability to leverage past interaction history with a user to deliver personalized responses in real-time.

data.source: Simulated interactions based on constructed user personas and histories.
data.annotation: Generated through a modular data curation pipeline minimizing irrelevant content.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated based on the model's choice of response in simulated user queries.
methodology.interpretation: Assess whether models can select the correct response that aligns with the user's profile state.
methodology.baseline_results: Frontier models such as GPT-4.1, o4-mini, GPT-4.5, and others achieving around 50% accuracy overall.
methodology.validation: Human evaluations for assessing quality of generated data.
